pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ bhattena nimantesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṁ, kulāni payirupāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.9: tatiyampi kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.11: “Yampi mayaṁ, bhante, bhattaṁ karimhā ayyassa upanandassa kāraṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.13: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto purebhattaṁ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā āgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.15: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.16: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.17: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.20: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.23.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:1.24: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṁ saṅghassatthāya khādanīyaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.4: Atha kho te manussā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.6: “Esāvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto gāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.7: “Idaṁ, bhante, khādanīyaṁ ayyassa upanandassa dassetvā saṅghassa dātabban”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.10: “tena hi, bhikkhave, paṭiggahetvā nikkhipatha yāva upanando āgacchatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.11: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto—“bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṁ purebhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjitun”ti pacchābhattaṁ kulāni payirupāsitvā divā paṭikkami, khādanīyaṁ ussāriyittha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.12: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.13: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.14: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.17: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.20.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:2.21: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaradānasamaye kukkuccāyantā kulāni na payirupāsanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.6.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:3.8: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvarakammaṁ karonti, attho ca hoti sūciyāpi suttenapi satthakenapi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.6.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.7: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:4.8: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti, attho ca hoti bhesajjehi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.4: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, santaṁ bhikkhuṁ āpucchā kulāni payirupāsituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.6.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:5.7: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.16: yena nimantito taṁ antamaso kusaggenapi bhuttaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.18: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.21: Paṭhamaṁ pādaṁ ummāraṁ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.1.26: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.1: Nimantite nimantitasaññī santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.2: Nimantite vematiko santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc46:6.2.3: Nimantite animantitasaññī santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁ vā pacchābhattaṁ vā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, aññatra samayā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
